NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Thank you for your application
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} and Parent/Guardian,
Thank you for submitting your application for NCS. We will be in touch if we need any further information or to confirm the status of your application.
In the meantime, you can log into your account online to check if you have completed all parts of the application (please note that this needs to be completed by {!Contact.FirstName}'s legal guardian). If you have forgotten your login details, you can recover them here: https://bookings.the-challenge.org/login-password.php
If you would like to find out more about the programme, please visit our website: www.NCStheChallenge.org/
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
